website_summaries.verdict: These are the highest shooting stomp rockets. They can go up to 400 feet with the right stomp.
pros: Older kids will get a thrill without a high cost or the need for a power cord
Adults will also really enjoy these rockets
A good gift for a middle schooler or teen
cons: Unless you are in a field or open area, you may find yourself quickly losing track of these high fliers

customer_reviews.title: They really go up high but it is made so ...
customer_reviews.text: They really go up high but it is made so cheap that the rockets broke in 3 weeks and the pump had to be reinforced so it would not shoot across....instead of up.
customer_reviews.author: Mec

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 4-6 year olds!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his stomp rocket!! He purchased one last summer and after much abuse the part you stomp on got a small hole and wasn’t pushing as much air to the rockets. He is begging for another set for his birthday. Definitely still giving 5 stars because he is very rough on his toys. Would probably last longer for most kids, good quality for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMoRx

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Cheap waste of money and disappointment to my son on his birthday. First, problem is the legs are made of cheap plastic and don't stay together. Second those same cheap legs do not stand up in grass so you cannot use it in a park or yard. Third, 5 of the 7 rockets didn't fit tight enough to be airtight so they won't shoot. Finally, you have to weigh over 100 lbs to push enough air to shoot the rockets. Please parents shy away from this product and don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Burchell

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old grandson for his birthday. He loves it, it really does fly 400 feet so make sure you have a large area. It came missing legs to the launcher but still worked with someone holding it. I wrote to the company asking for replacement legs and they quickly sent me a whole new rocket and launcher. Kudos to this company. Great Toy fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: The rocket is Tiny and only goes 40 ft, not 400 ft.
customer_reviews.text: Gross exaggeration on the manufacturers claims. This rocket is actually smaller than the original stomp rocket and only goes about 40 feet straight up. We tried multiple times to get it over the top of a light pole. We had 170 lb adults stomping it. It is exact same launcher as the original stomp rocket, expect the diameter of the launch tube is smaller. STICK WITH THE ORIGINAL.
customer_reviews.author: K, C, and little J

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for preteens!
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun! While I really doubt we could get this to go up to 400 feet, the kids have a blast and get it going pretty high. Everyone took turns. Downfall is that the rockets themselves aren’t terrible durable. One of ours cracked before we even made it outside to play.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Get a different product
customer_reviews.text: There are other similar products that work much, much better. These rockets broke so easily. Not worth it at all. Not even a day of use before they were all broken. The idea of stomp rockets is great and so much fun. This particular one is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: High flying... smile making
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it! Really that's all that matters. Setting it up and jumping on the air bladder to make the rocket fly always elicits a lot of laughing and smiling faces. Watch out though, those darn rockets really do go a long way!! Find space to do this so they don't end up landing somewhere you can't get them...
customer_reviews.author: Rindahl

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Garbage!  So disappointing. . . . I used to love these when I was a teenager
customer_reviews.text: The fletchings of the first rocket I grabbed to pull out of the box crumbled and broke off because the plastic fletching wrap was so brittle and thin (see picture). I barely touched it and hadn't even started to lift it out yet. I only received FOUR rockets in the box not the SIX advertised! The base was so cheap and flimsy that the plastic base was so flimsy and "easy to assemble" that it kept disassembling itself during use and couldn't keep the rocket upright because it kept bending to the side. I used to love original set we had when I was a teenager but this one is cheap garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Prause

customer_reviews.title: Super cool rocket that went higher than I ever could imagine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these rockets for my nephew for his birthday. I thought they looked like they would be fun for him and his siblings to play with. When he opened them we went outside to see what they would do. I was blown away when I saw how high these rockets went into the air. The young boys were stomping on them and they went pretty high, but then the adult men started doing it and it was unbelievable how high these things went. It literally became a night of entertainment for our entire family. I will for sure buy these rockets again as a gift for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Junk and False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I order from Amazon all the time & am very selective with bad reviews but this product is easily the worst product I have ever purchased on Amazon. The rockets all break on first or second use & the base is flimsy and comes apart. The advertising is also false as the rockets fail to go higher than any other stomp rocket set. I have another stomp rocket set purchased from the local hobby store and it has lasted months and nothing has broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Fun for adults too !
customer_reviews.text: This set is an absolute blast and not just for kids. My husband and I get into it more than my 7 year old sometimes. We like to have competitions to see who can stomp the rocket higher into the sky. The rockets and the stomping pad are well made. We haven't had any issues with either. It is super easy to set up. Kids can set it up without parents help. The rockets sit securely into the base and go sky rocketing as soon as you stomp on it. Definitely one of my son's favorite gifts we've gotten him.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Shoots high in the sky.
customer_reviews.text: This is an affordable toy that is great for 5-10 year old kids. It shoots up pretty high. The rocket stand can be lowered to shoot sideways rather than just vertically. There are 5-6 rockets. The rocket fins are flimsy and can easily tear away from the rocket body but you can super glue them back onto the rocket.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: I bought one for every niece and nephew I have!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for every niece and nephew I have and I will never forget Christmas Eve from ages 2 years old all the way up to 15 years old boys and girls all in the front yard stomping on those things so they could send them as high as possible. You cannot beat it for the money. If there was a 6-star rating this item would get it.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Pike

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The whole setup is flimsy and cheap. The rockets don't survive more than a few flights, and they don't travel anywhere near as high as advertised. Very disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My 4 year old loves them and so does my dog! We have a lot of fun. I’ve given this as a gift a few times too. Just be careful that you have a lot of open space. We’ve gotten them stuck on the roof a few times but they always come down. A good educational item too to teach little ones how they work too. All in all awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift to get kids outside!  So simple but fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my 10 year old nephew. It was a hit! The whole family was out in the drowsy launching these things! The only thing to know is if you don’t point it straight up you can really injure people if you shoot it at them accidentally. We learned the hard way. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Simply Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple thought put in action kind of toy which keeps your child busy for hours. My kids are so much into Wall-e and I wasn't sure what to get them. This toy has made them creative and somewhat fulfilled their desire to fly to space (at least for the time being). We connected the head to a para shoot and have been experimenting a lot of science laws such as gravity, wind impacts on the fly and land and so on...
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: Got thia for my 8 year olds birthday! Super hit! All the kids loved it and have bought 2 more since for gifts! The stand is rough as in it tends to fall apart but my dad put electrical tape around it and its good to go! Fun for all ages! Such a simple toy but brings alot of entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Homemaker05

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: The rockets do shoot very far, however the kit is not very durable. 🚀
customer_reviews.author: ccoop

customer_reviews.title: Low tech stomp rocket trumps all other techie toys received!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome find! It was a gift for a 5 year old and all the kiddos lined up to have a turn stomping to make rocket launch. Even the adults lined up to take a turn smiling in the nostalgia of playing with a throwback stomp rocket! Hours of pure, simple fun! Travels to decent heights. Impressive! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: always MIA

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: Great idea for a toy but it broke within the first ten minutes. I'm not sure if it was the product itself or the fact that 4 year olds are jumping on it but since that is kind of the point of the toy I would expect it to have held up better. It was a fun ten minutes though.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my 7 year old nephew. He loves it and it’s provided hours of entertainment. I searched for a long time trying to find a decent gift for a good price before coming across this item. I am happy I did, it was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: My Name

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of fun!
customer_reviews.text: While the grandkids did not have to fight over stomping, and got to challenge each other, they were also very good to take turns. We do question how long the plastic "bladders" will hold up to being stomped on though. Once they crack or split, the rocket will no longer work. So, time will tell. As of right now - January 2019 - the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: flgma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy, worth every dollar!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a blast it was amazing how straight it would go straight up and back down, and you can til it to make it go at an angle and tore the kids out running to get the rockets, one of the rockets partially came apart but still working my daughter probably stepped on it, we had a blast with this toy!!
customer_reviews.author: mike neuzil

customer_reviews.title: Well done!
customer_reviews.text: These rockets are launched from a solid rubber compressor sturdy enough to support a jump and stomp from a grown adult. The sound of launch, as well as the flight are thoroughly satisfying. A young child will be mystified by their own ability to achieve extraordinary altitudes. This is a great toy with no need for batteries that will give children a great time outdoors in any season and will give many adults a nostalgic opportunity to relate to the kiddos in their life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great way to keep a group of kids busy and learning outside!
customer_reviews.text: Stomp rockets are one of the most impressive kid powered toys ever invented. Get a milk crate for the kids to jump down off of on to the launch bag and stand back. Oursays these definitely do go 350-450' high on the best launches and 250' on a mediocre one. I would buyas these go high enough to get lost and/or destroyed by an unfortunate landing from time to time. Be prepared to help the kiddos repair the fins with packing tape as the launches and landings are sometimes energetic enough to fatigue and tear the plastic. The minor amount of additional weight added by a tape repair job does not adversely affect the performance in a noticeable way.
customer_reviews.author: JA. Espelien

customer_reviews.title: breaks very easily
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth 20 dollars barely worth ten . My kid played with this and most of the rockets get trashed after the first time flying. Then the whole thing just broke at the end and someone had to hold the shutter up dangerous DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: PEM

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, disposable, launcher
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the launcher, is akin to something you would buy in the toy section of a dollar store. The rockets, on the other hand, are great. You'll have to design your own launcher, to get the most out of it. I built my own and it's a blast.
customer_reviews.author: Steamed

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a young boy. He was super excited about it. They actually got it out and started playing with it at the birthday party. It broke within 30 minutes. They had a blast while it worked though.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Stompin' Good Fun
customer_reviews.text: Kids LOVE stomp rockets! You can't go wrong with these! The grandkids can spend lots of time stomping for the highest flight. Be prepared to get the ladder out when they land on the roof!! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Book Browser

customer_reviews.title: No batteries- Just fun!
customer_reviews.text: Three of my grandsons got these for Christmas and they all love them. One of them reported being able to make a goal in the basketball net with his. :-) These are a fun relatively inexpensive toy and my kids are getting their mileage out of them! I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loads of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add a little pizazz to a program for 12 year olds and it worked incredibly well. I could hardly get them to leave as they took turn after turn blasting these rockets sky high. Loads of fun and very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: chaoticmuse

customer_reviews.title: Fun birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My son received this fir his 7th birthday and it was a hit. All of the kids lined up over and over to take a turn. Well worth it. It did break a little at the base with all of the heavy usage but some tape easily corrected the issues
customer_reviews.author: Lee B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun In Open Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for grandkids who live 3-states away. Very effective launcher. Suggest you use in an open field away from tall buildings or trees. Either that or order the 3-pack of replacement rockets along with this launcher.
customer_reviews.author: Kokomo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is made pretty cheap and did not hold up after 30 minutes of play. We had one a few years ago that lasted a while and the kids loved it. I am disappointed how flimsy this was.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: fins will break off, requires 100lb+ kid for launch
customer_reviews.text: pretty low cost thing, but half the fins broke off after 6 rounds of launches. Probably can glue them back on, but seriously they break right away. I'd have paid $5 more if it would hold up better. Also my 9 year old is ~65lbs and can only get the rockets ~30 ft in the air...grown up force required to really get an entertaining launch.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Neukum

customer_reviews.title: Goes wicked high!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this isn’t a “ little kid” stomp rocket- my son ( and husband) jump on this with all their weight- sending it 50 plus feet on the air. For an inexpensive gift- this is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: ML Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Great for science class; great for fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my science class and it will work great with a photogate so that my 8th graders can make various measurements as they study physics. This product is also just plain fun to play with! The rockets go super high. In terms of being a durable assembly, I ended up using a few rubber bands to make the three leg stand hold together really tightly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids of all ages!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves these! They fly so high, only down side is the wings can chip or break off after multiple uses- still fly’s without them just not as straight or high.
customer_reviews.author: nick kibler

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: Weak base, and the top part of the rocket let air out when too much pressure is given. On a hot summer day we played with them and did not like that a few started leaking air from on top. The base I had to put duck tape. Too much of a hastle, but on a side note it did go up pretty high.
customer_reviews.author: Harviy L.

customer_reviews.title: Sky high fun!
customer_reviews.text: This Christmas gift for a 10 y/o was a blast to take outside in our unseasonably nice weather. Set it up in the front yard and was pleasantly surprised with distance these things flew! The mount is pretty lightweight but the swivel for directional is neat. Only landed two on the roof of the house! Definitely something we will use time and time again as long as the mount and balloon hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Arasin Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great famous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for my 8 year old grandson. Great way for everyone to have fun and get some exercise. My 6ft 1in son had a great time playing with his nephew. After a few minutes of them playing 6 other kids on the block came to join them. Great way for everyone to put their electronics down and just have fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I think I have ordered this over 10 times. It is our go to gift for birthdays for kids between the ages of 3 and 8, boy or girl. Everyone loves it, including the parents!
customer_reviews.author: shineon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun toy. My kids love it. Down side. Wish it had a better stand design. The stand falls apart very easily and is difficult to setup. Goes back together but it’s just frustrating design. My 8 yr olds need my help every time. Also the square pump to jump on to make the rockets fly is a bit flimsy and unstable. But overall super fun and good toy. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jori Reid

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Idea is neat. We saw one at a wine festival. I am assuming a different brand. This one is junk. It is poorly constructed. We have played with it maybe 15 minutes and the base has fallen apart 3 times and is not easy to put together. I suggest looking for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: A few of the rocket fins came off after a couple of uses but it doesn't make them unusable. They still work fairly well.
customer_reviews.author: ltlhoot

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: The stand falls apart unless on uses electrical tape to hold it together. One must spray the rocket tube with a dry Teflon spray to reduce friction if you wish it to reach advertised height
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 6 year old. All the kids in the neighborhood live to stomp on the pedal and chase the rockets. It’s a lot of fun. The rockets aren’t the most durable but it’s fun!
customer_reviews.author: jessica m avalos

customer_reviews.title: this was easy and safe fun for all
customer_reviews.text: The rockets do fly super-high, and seemed durable as they came crashing to the pavement. The rubber "stomp" pad seems durable as well. My 3- and 4-year old boys had a blast! My only beef is that it doesn't come with legible instructions on how to piece the base together. I did wing it, and used photos from the back of the box...but they're not very hi-res. Overall, when setup, this was easy and safe fun for all.
customer_reviews.author: egadgetboy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart every time we use it, after each stomp. The plastic pieces at the base are flimsy and don't stay together, which causes it not to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Nyhanna

customer_reviews.title: Fun idea, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Super simple and easy to use. But half the rockets didn’t even fit on the launcher. All but one had broken fins after a couple launches.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew and he loves it. Even the adults were playing with it. Made a little cheaply but its expected with the price. I would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea Elledge

customer_reviews.title: Fun even with little annoyances.
customer_reviews.text: My boys & neighborhood kids have a lot of fun with this. Rockets go high, but some get stuck on the tube so you have to readjust them often. Not very sturdy - tips over a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our 4 year old great grandsons! They had a ball with it! The age listed was a little off...they are four and did it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the grandkids to play with when they visit. They love it. Hours of fun. Great value and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was bad. The box came bent and messed up. This is a birthday gift. So it pretty sad for me to pay for a messed up box
customer_reviews.author: Karli Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all
customer_reviews.text: My kids, husband, and the neighbors have had lots of fun with this. 400 feet? Probably not, but it can get pretty high. Fun for ages 3-30. Ages 6-10 probably had the most fun.
customer_reviews.author: LoganMama

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: My students had a BLAST setting these rockets off. We used them to calculate equations of parabolas formed by the rocket's path. They keep asking when we can do the rocket project again!
customer_reviews.author: danielle r

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a gift and I know it will be enjoyed. Great to get the kids outside and away from electronic devices!!!
customer_reviews.author: caymanmom

customer_reviews.title: Great toy - provided hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rocket toy. My boys have played with it several times and each time it provided about an hour of entertainment. It does not go as high as it claims but it does shoot up very high. The stomp pad is more durable than it looks but the rocket "fins" come off very easily. The rockets will still work without the fins but not quite as well. I would recommend buying a package of replacement rockets just so you are sure to have plenty that work. If the rocket fins would not have fallen off this would have gotten 5 stars easily!
customer_reviews.author: A. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fun and awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Fun but will break easily if you have rambunctious boys. Supervision is needed and a lot of fun is to be had!
customer_reviews.author: Weewillowmom

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas or birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: This flys really high!! I would say about 100ft at least. Great toy for younger boys or girls.
customer_reviews.author: M D

customer_reviews.title: Crowd-pleaser
customer_reviews.text: This was my 7-year-old nephew’s favorite birthday gift! All the kids played with it all afternoon and evening after he opened it, and I enjoyed watching them!
customer_reviews.author: eboo

customer_reviews.title: I dont know who had more fun!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like going old school and seeing the grandkids AND Grandpa and Mom playing with such a simple toy. Loved loved loved it. I wish we had more rockets!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and play
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 7 year old nephew. They were an absolute hit! Easy to set up and use. Definitely suggest purchasing additional rockets for the ones that keep going over the neighbors fence!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Gift for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 year old brother for Christmas. All other presents were pushed aside after this one, everyone played with this one! Will buy again just to bring to a get together. Perfect gift it seems for all ages
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Grandsons love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great ! Only bad thing is Grandsons keep trying to shoot over my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these...all different. This is our favorite. It goes the furthest and seems the most durable. The big kids (husbands) enjoy it as much as all the littles.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are 300 lbs, cannot shoot rocket. Certainly hard for a child.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old grandson for Christmas a little concerned because the age on it said "16". But it looked like something he would really like so I thought I'd take a chance. He LOVED it! He was able to stomp the rockets up to the roof of his house at his age. I was very pleased he had no trouble doing it. And my daughter and son-in-law deemed it as being safe for him and they are very picky with that. Even my son-in-law played with it with him and got a big kick out of it. lol
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to our nephew and he really enjoyed it. The rockets are pretty much what you would expect foam and plastic. Our only complaint is that the base seems to come apart often. The rockets do fly to what I would believe to be the advertised height. Everything does seem durable, I think the rockets were shot all day and seemed none the worse for wear.
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to use it yet, but my son was able to set it up and test it without actually launching since we were in the house. All of my kids are excited to play with the 2 sets we got. However, one of the extreme rockets is missing its top. Would love to know how to get a replacement rocket so we have a full set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: Second time I have bought this. Kids love it. If you happen to STEP on the rockets they will NOT function again. No big deal. DON'T step on them!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to birthday gift for young boys.
customer_reviews.text: We have lots of fun with this and our 4 year old son. This is a great toy to take to the park and easily make new friends. It also is our favorite birthday gift toy to get for his friends.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this. I gave it 3 stars because it’s a bit difficult to set up and keep it together so I taped it and now it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaD

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old and 4 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The only gift my 7 year old nephew took out on Christmas and played with all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy. When my son takes it out front ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. When my son takes it out front all the neighborhood kids line up for turns. It goes very high though, so high you almost can't see it. They have so much fun and if you tilt it a little they love running after the rockets and trying to catch them. They are great outside toys. I have no complaints. The stickers don't stick that great but no one cares if they are on there or not.
customer_reviews.author: JKDZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 5 yo birthday!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a present for a 5 yo and he loved it! Started playing with it right away. Easy to set up and away the rockets go!
customer_reviews.author: Mayra

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun toy to get the kids outside. I'd recommend for kids 4+ and to launch these in an open field. Be sure to pay attention to where they land - it can sometimes be tricky to find them.
customer_reviews.author: JonH

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great physical activity
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for our 3 year old, he loves it and has so much fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump does not pressure to the rocket
customer_reviews.text: Pump does not pressure to the rocket. Never could get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: MeginOKC

customer_reviews.title: Shoots higher than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun! Shoots up really high. Great gift. Got destroyed quickly, after only a couple of hours on Christmas day. Then the rockets began to break down and the rocket stand wouldn't stay together or up straight. But, it was definitely fun for the time it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap_sk8

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for any age. They really do fly far and it’s nice to aim them laterally too if you have lots of tree cover.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A

customer_reviews.title: Flies high
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Marky Sparky rocket at the same time. The D&L rockets fly higher. The D&L rockets take the abuse a little better. They maintain their "roundness" and slip over the launch tube better. The launch stand is a little flimsy, but everything fits into the smaller box for storage. This toy drew a crowd at a large family gathering. Everybody from 2-year-olds to adults enjoyed launching the rockets.
customer_reviews.author: K. Farrar

customer_reviews.title: kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so fun! Can't believe that I didn't know about these before! My girls are 3 & 5 and they love them. Great way to go outside and play!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: We have one and bought this as a gift, very fun and works pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea- or to get your kids up and out of the house
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sons 8th birthday- and this is an amazing gadget! Such a simple concept that keeps my kids (along with the rest of the neighbor kids) entertained for hours... and I am not going to lie- the adults like it just as much. Super easy to set up, and super fun to see how high you can launch the rockets.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: No batteries ... only leg power. All ages.
customer_reviews.text: Simple and enormously entertaining. The kids between 2 and 30 use the over and over and over. At family reunions it has been a favorite for about 4 years. I always make sure to have one on hand. No batteries required ... only leg power,
customer_reviews.author: Duchess of Tetons

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: We had way more fun with this than we imagined. Really great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Fun for 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun for about two days and then air hose cracked and unusable. We love stomp rockets but this one was a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: It's a ( no pun) blast!
customer_reviews.text: As long as you can find some clear space like a park or beach -- it is awesome. Easy to use. My four year old grandson could even be successful. I ordered extra rockets too from Amazon. Make sure you order the core t rockets for the right launcher--I believe Amazon carries three versions-- all cool! I think it is as exciting for adults as it is for kids. We laugh so hard in anticipation and racing to see who can retrieve the rocket first.
customer_reviews.author: Maga loves her grand kids !

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. The launch pad keeps coming apart, but overall this is a great toy for all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew we all had fun playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: Quality great great price. Boys have fun as do adults. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Yard Rockets
customer_reviews.text: My Nephew and his friends (and some of the adults) had a great time with these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: We let our 3 and 4 year old boys play with this and they loved it. The packaging says it's for older kids but since the rockets launch depending on how hard someone can step on the bladder it's works for all ages in my opinion. Our 3 year old doesn't pack much power so he can only send the rocket 15' at most into the air which is perfect for a child of that size. An adult can really send it sailing though.
customer_reviews.author: Chtulhu's Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old grandson loves these rockets we have only lost one so far safe for indoor or outdoors
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old nephew loved this for Christmas. The rockets fly farther with more weight I.e adults got it to go further. You are also able to angle it which was a cool surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for the whole family. Played with it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: texcarembc

product_meta.title: Stomp Rocket Extreme Rocket 6 Rockets - Outdoor Rocket Toy Gift for Boys and Girls- Comes with Toy Rocket Launcher - Ages 9 Years Up
product_meta.description: Stomp Rocket Extreme Rockets gives you the ultimate in Stomp Rocket performance! It’s 100% KID powered: Run, jump and STOMP to launch these rockets up to 400 feet in the air -- that’s longer than a football field, including the end zones! Stomp Rocket Extreme is strong and durable, and great for active, outdoor play. Stomp Rockets have won lots of awards from industry experts, including iParenting Media, Dr. Toy and Creative Child Magazine. Includes 6 Extreme Stomp Rockets, Flame Stickers and Stomp Launcher. Refill rockets also available. For kids ages 9 and up.
feature_bullets: The ultimate in Stomp Rocket performance!
100% KID powered: Run, jump and STOMP to launch these rockets up to 400 feet in the air -- that's longer than a football field, including the end zones!
Take Stomp Rocket to the park or on vacation, and you’ll be amazed at how many children and adults want to play!
Includes a Stomp Launcher and 6 Super High Performance Rockets with flame stickers to apply
No batteries required; super easy, fast assembly; ages 9 and up
